title: Macabre Tales
description: A collection of weird and wonderful, quirky tales for all readers, to chill and entertain. But none of them could really happen... could they? The contents Shape Shift – Some things are not what they seem. Brain Leak – Time for a medical tale. Death on the Fly – A case of mutual hacking. Euthanasia Inc. – A solution to a growing problem? Farmer's End – An early American ghost story. Ideal Home – Just what they wanted to find? Indulgence – What (not) to do if you're overweight. Micro-Voices – They can drive you off-balance. Painfully Redundant – A medical progress casualty. The Potting Shed – One way to prolong your time. Serial Vision – A TV time terror tale. Slimming Plan – Surely a rewarding development?Slangered - Not a good way to increase height. Washed Out - Sinister visitors arrive in a lonely country house.
author: Tony  Thorne
